Title: Boys & Girls
Plot: Hank hands a completed draft of "Santa Monica Cop" over to Samurai Apocalypse, but he still finds himself stuck in L.A. when he's asked to take Kali, his "acquaintance" from the flight to Los Angles, out for a night on the town. Tyler crashes at Karen and Becca's house while he recovers from his injuries. Charlie is rescued from  a serious parental crisis by Stuart's nanny, Lizzie.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language
